name: Meedo51Facts
0:
”Alexa ask change me for a fact”
”Alexa, change me”
”Alexa tell change me to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: change me
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask change me for Space Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

Change me provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch change me" or "Alexa, open change me" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
